name: RaiseYourVoice
0:
”Alexa, open Raise Your Voice.”
”Alexa, tell Raise Your Voice to call my representative.”
”Alexa, ask Raise Your Voice about legislation.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: raise your voice
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use the skill to: 

Call your representative. If you already know what you want to say, get connected to your representative or one of your senators right away. 

Get AARP’s take on current legislation, and then call your representative. Learn what you can say and get connected to the right person based on where you live. 

Hear AARP’s position on several core issues to prepare for future calls.
